General.Name: Waga Energy SA
General.Description: Waga Energy Société anonyme, together with its subsidiaries, develops biomethane injections projects serving the energy transitions. It is involved in the design, development, financing, construction, installation, and exploitation solutions, as well as sale of biomethane. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Meylan, France.
General.Address: 2 chemin du Vieux Chêne, Meylan, France, 38240
